resources.string: Question 1: Which keywords in the Java programming language are correct?
Question 2: A ViewGroup is a big View that can contain smaller Views inside of it. Which answer is correct?
The smaller Views are called the children of the ViewGroup and might be TextView or ImageView.
The ViewGroup is called the parent of its children.
Each child is not nested (completely contained) within its parent.
Question 3: WCAG? Which answer is correct?
Color schemes that include darker and lighter variations of your primary and secondary colors.
Check if text is accessible on different-colored backgrounds.
The Web Content Accessibility Guidelines legibility standards.
Question 4: A … variable can contain one of two possible values, true or false.
Question 5: Any series of characters—letters, numbers, punctuation marks, and blanks—is called a … of characters.
Question 6: When we tell the computer to execute a method of an object, we say we are...?
Question 7: Some methods have no return value? In that case, we write the word...
